name: Elasto Mania Trilogy Pack
description:
This pack contains the 3 games at a 15% discount.

All your favorite ELMA titles in one iconic collection including Elasto Mania, Elasto Mania II and Action SuperCross. Whether you are a long-time fan of this cult classic indie motorbike universe or meeting our enduro simulator series for the first time, the Elasto Mania Trilogy Pack is a great deal and an epic experience in one neat bundle.

Action Supercross - Where it all began
Action SuperCross is the direct predecessor of Elasto Mania, the grandfather of all physics-based motorbike simulators. This experimental piece of gaming history is not only a fascinating backstory to a number of famous franchises, but it also massively feels like time travel at your fingertips. The challenge is not in speed, but in beating actual world records. Do you have what it takes? Our dedicated community of long time players is the gift that keeps giving, their creations and the level editor will make sure you never run out of obstacles.

Elasto Mania Remastered - The original cult classic
2020 marks the 20th anniversary of our beloved indie motorbike simulation game, a colorful 2D racing experience and a true blast from the past. Making your way through tricky terrain, controlling speed, balancing tilt and collecting goodies is challenging to master, but you will quickly get the hang of it… once you start playing! The full version of the original edition contains 54 levels and a level editor, but there is always something new to discover when it comes to this retro game of skill & style. Feel free to let your imagination run amok in the level editor or explore the thousands of fan creations, gameplay content, levels, graphics, tools and even multiplayer modes on the community websites.

Elasto Mania II - The quirky second chapter
Do you want to take it easy or do you want to take it to the next level? Elasto Mania II is still a 2D enduro simulator with a nostalgic feel, but the 2017 release has updated physics, new graphics and a couple of additional elements too. The full version contains 32 levels and a level editor as well as moving platforms, gates with keys and teleports, extra challenges and even more collectibles. There is always something new to discover, so when you think you nailed that balance it’s time to build your own levels in the level editor, explore community websites for extra challenges like the Official Level Pack or compete with other Elasto Maniacs for the best time.
